translated: The unperturbed meditative stabilization causes one not to observe any phenomenon that is perturbed.üîΩThe unvari

analyzed: bkod pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bkod pa chen po dang ldan par byed do //

analyzed: snang ba thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la ye shes kyis snang bar byed do //
translated: The samadhi of the complete discernment of all appearances causes the light of wisdom to shine on all dharmas.

translated: The samadhi of the manifestation of equality causes the attainment of the one-pointedness of all samadhis.

analyzed: rlung gi gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis ni chos thams cad la gnas par mi byed do //
translated: The samadhi of the abode of the wind causes all dharmas not to be abided in.
